column5: Gain a strong understanding of modern banking and finance theory and practice, with particular insight into the performance, risk management and regulation of banks. You’re taught by academics and practitioners who are at the forefront of this rapidly changing sector.We offer you training in banking, finance, management and accounting as well as an in-depth appreciation of the finance industry. You’ll develop your critical thinking and decision-making techniques, enabling you to appraise:
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
